headline: American Tower: How To Make 10% Returns Here While Lowering Your Risk
summary: American Tower stock has lost 24% since our first Sell rating and reached our price target. We go over the big headwinds ahead and tell you how we would buy it now. Read on at Seeking Alpha.

headline: U.S. Equity REIT Capital Offerings More Than Tripled In November
summary: On an annual basis, the amount of capital raised fell 11.4% from $6.84 billion in November 2023, according to S&P Global Market Intelligence data.
